attributes.action: GRANT LEAVE TO REMAIN TO EU NATIONALS.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to amend the immigration law to grant Leave to Remain to EU Nationals living in UK before 23 June 2016 &  allow six months Free Movement to EU and Commonwealth citizens before making a Point Based System Application.
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to amend the immigration law to grant Leave to Remain to EU Nationals living in UK before 23 June 2016 &  allow six months Free Movement to EU and Commonwealth citizens before making a Point Based System Application.
